revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Flower Paradise |image = [[File:Flower Paradise.png|300px]] |caption = A bird's-eye view of Flower Paradise. |tokens = 96,500 |location = North of Route 224. }} '''Flower Paradise''' is a [[dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Pok√©mon and Dungeon Stats==

Base Health |- | [[File:Gloom.png|40px]] Gloom || rowspan=7 | <center> 2,603,000 || [[File:Parasect.png|40px]] Parasect || <center> 9,900,000 |- | [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout || rowspan=2| [[File:Breloom.png|40px]] Breloom || rowspan=6| <center> 11,000,000 |- | [[File:Tangela.png|40px]] Tangela |- | [[File:Skiploom.png|40px]] Skiploom || rowspan=2|[[File:Shaymin_(land).png|40px]] Shaymin (land) |- | [[File:Lombre.png|40px]] Lombre |- | [[File:Seedot.png|40px]] Seedot || rowspan=2| [[File:Shaymin_(sky).png|40px]] Shaymin (sky) |- | [[File:Roselia.png|40px]] Roselia |}
== Items ==
The following items can be obtained from opening chests in this dungeon.
